Description: Position Summary:The OB-GYN Consultant will serve as a subject matter expert in Obstetrics and Gynecology. They will provide advanced medical care, offer expert opinions on complex cases, and contribute to the strategic development of the department. The Consultant will lead clinical teams, mentor junior staff, and engage in scholarly activities.Skills
Skills:
MBBS degree from a recognized medical school.
Master's degree or Ph.D. in Obstetrics and Gynecology.
Minimum of 4 years of post-graduation experience in Obstetrics and Gynecology.
Established a reputation as a leader in the field.
Proven ability to provide expert consultations and guidance.
Leadership and team management skills.
Active participation in medical research, publications, and conferences.
